ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import FieldDefinition registro = widget.Entity if registro == None: return status = int(registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value)
if (status != 1 and status != 4): widget.View.Commands["NEW"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
